text: Andris Bērziņš (born 10 December 1944) is a Latvian businessman and politician. He was President of Latvia from 2011 to 2015. Bērziņš was the President of Unibanka from 1993 to 2004. He was elected as President by the Saeima on 2 June 2011. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Latvia
title: Andris Bērziņš (Latvian President)
